extendedInfo.description: Are you away from home ? Are you missing your favourite shows on TV ?Rock tv is the perfect answer for you...Watch over 100+ channels on your mobile whenever you want without even registering.You need not install any other plugins or drivers. Just install the app and you will be ready to rock.Rock TV application allows you to watch your favourite channels on  mobile. You must have sometimes wondered if variety is the only reason to have so many types of channels. Rock TV keeps all types of audiences in mind whether they are children, women, youth or students and  thus offers  a number of channels to everyone.  There are  broad range of categories like Action, Comedy, Cartoon, Entertainment, Health, Movies, News, Documentary, Lifestyle and Music. Its the quickest way to have access to live TV channels using Internet connection or WI-FI Network from your mobile.Rock TV Features:Simple Installation and no third party plugins needed.Switch over to different Quality based on the network speed.Brightness & Volume control.Choose channels by category and language.Full Screen view.Keep your favourite channel in one place.Request options for more channels.Quick channel selection.Sorting channels by name,Category and Language.On screen control for channel selection while watching TV.Our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/rocktvappRock TV offers :BBC NewsB4U MoviesB4U MusicHBO PlusJeevan TVNDTV NewsWorld TravelAaj TakAsianet NewsWe and much more..

reviews.title: Fantastic App
reviews.comment: If you are looking for a professional quality application,  then this is the only solution.  Go ahead and download it with peace of mind. The streaming speed depends on the network and sometimes when too many users the server returns busy note.  That\'s natural for a free app though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: The only reason you get 5 stars is for having AlsatTV.because its albanian channel I use it constantly its so smooth.
reviews.author: Blerim Bela

reviews.title: Add more channels
reviews.comment: This great and it really works! I hope you can add more channels. Thanks for this.
reviews.author: Mark Vincent Alviz

reviews.title: Good for GPRS or 2G! But!
reviews.comment: Good  ! Keep it up ! But ! Please add more English news channels for G.P.R.S  . .Please improve this app more for gprs internet networks specially . India tv is not working ! Good for gprs  internet network ! But kindly improve its video quality  for gprs internet networks . Thank you very much ! Kindly add care world for gprs or 2g internet in Health category &  DD news , ABP news , India TV also in Hindi news category &  Cnn Ibn in English . Kindly add Sudarshan news channel . Jai Hind ! Vandematram .
reviews.author: JATIN SHARMA

reviews.title: Really Rocking App...
reviews.comment: A Simple,  smart, super and small app.... Something I was looking for a long time.. Now all my favorite channels are truly on my palm.  Keep Rocking, Rock TV...!!

reviews.title: The best I have ever seen.
reviews.comment: Awesome app. I was waiting for one like this. So good to watch in HD videos. The only con is that the developers haven\'t give much links for sports especially IPL and football. Overall looks superb and the color pattern, arrangements are so cool. Congrats to all of\' them who made this awesome App.
